conceptMapSafe

public static int conceptMapSafe(java.lang.String inConceptIRI,
                                 java.lang.String outConceptIRI,
                                 java.lang.String owlURI)
Given ontology file name, check if the output annotated with outConceptIRI is safe to be fed into input annotated with inConceptIRI. safe: same, equivalent or input is ancestor of output

Parameters:
inConceptIRI -
outConceptIRI -
owlURI -
Returns:
0 not safe, 1 safe
